name: Tower Princess (itch)
description:
(The content in the "play game" section was made before the jam. But everything before it and on that main menu was made for this.)

Hey everybody! I saw that #loadingjam was going on and decided to create a new menu and loading screen for a project I recently made.

The main premise is that you are a knight and you want to rescue people and things (usually princes and princesses) that have been captured and imprisoned in these towers. I'm going to keep updating it in the future, and there's not much to the game as of yet, since Ive just been working on systems, but let me know what you guys think of the loading screen and the game itself!

Music was done by Chris Walasek

Art and Programming done by me, Edil Ostolaza

Concepts and Ideas from Trace Gordon and Gannon Jaspering

You can follow me on twitter or visit my website for more info:

https://twitter.com/Edmang_Legends
www.edilostolaza.com
